sentences.en: A dynamo is used to generate electricity.
sentences.cn: 发电机用于发电.

sentences.en: A good rule of thumb is that a broker must generate sales of ten times his salary if his employer is to make a profit.
sentences.cn: 根据经验来看，如果雇主要获得利润，那么其代理商必须卖出相当于其工资10倍的销售额。

sentences.en: a useful technique for generating new ideas
sentences.cn: 能产生新创意的有用技术

sentences.en: During by the steam engine drive, the electric generator can generate electricity.
sentences.cn: 由蒸汽机驱动时, 发电机可以发电.

sentences.en: Harnessing the wind to generate electricity dates back to 1890.
sentences.cn: 利用风来发电可以追溯到1890年.

sentences.en: I generate my own electricity, and send out impulses to trigger contraction.
sentences.cn: 我给自己发电, 发出兴奋波,引起收缩.

sentences.en: In the 19 th century waterpower was widely utilized to generate electricity.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪人们大规模使用水力来发电.

sentences.en: Most cities generate a complex brew of pollutants.
sentences.cn: 多数城市都会产生各种物质混杂的污染物。

sentences.en: New business we'll generate should far exceed what's lost.
sentences.cn: 我们新招揽的生意会远远超过丢失的那部分.

sentences.en: The company, New England Electric, burns coal to generate power.
sentences.cn: 新英格兰电力公司用煤发电。

sentences.en: The new counting cell positions are used to generate additional pole counts.
sentences.cn: 计数单元的新位置就用来形成新补充的极点数.

sentences.en: The program would generate a lot of new jobs.
sentences.cn: 这个项目将创造许多新的就业岗位。

sentences.en: The project generated enormous interest.
sentences.cn: 这个项目引起了人们极大的兴趣。

sentences.en: The resulting distortions in the wavefront generate the fringe contours.
sentences.cn: 波阵面上发生的畸变生成了条纹线.

sentences.en: These nerve centres generate rhythmic movements; or to be more specific, rhythmic stomach movements.
sentences.cn: 这些神经中心产生有节奏的运动，或者更确切地说，是有节奏的肠胃蠕动。

sentences.en: to generate electricity/heat/power
sentences.cn: 发电；产生热 / 动力

sentences.en: We can generate electric power by splitting atoms.
sentences.cn: 我们可以利用原子核裂变发电.

sentences.en: We had to have an actor who could generate real empathy. Plus he had to carry the audience through a lot of plot.
sentences.cn: 我们得找一名能真正入戏的男演员，而且他还得能让观众跟上复杂的剧情中。

sentences.en: We need someone to generate new ideas.
sentences.cn: 我们需要有人出新主意。

sentences.en: Wind turbines generate electricity for the local community.
sentences.cn: 风力机为当地社区发电。

words.tran_cn: 生殖的；生产的；有生殖力的；有生产力的

trans.tran_cn: 形成，造成，产生物理反应，产生（后代），引起
trans.tran_en: to produce heat, electricity, or another form of energy
